p: The test compounds nylidrin hydrochloride (~95%), ifenprodil (+)–tartrate salt (≥98%), labetalol hydrochloride (≥98%), ritodrine hydrochloride (99.6%), fenoterol hydrobromide (≥98%), eliprodil (≥98%), clenbuterol hydrochloride (≥95%), and bambuterol hydrochloride (≥98%) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich. As control compounds, the M2 inhibitor amantadine hydrochloride (AMT; ≥98%) and the polymerase inhibitor ribavirin (RBV; ≥98%) were also from Sigma-Aldrich. The NA inhibitor oseltamivir carboxylate (OSV-C; ≥98%) was acquired from United States Biological (Swampscott, MA, USA).
